metadata.title: CVE-2018-12930 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: ntfs_end_buffer_async_read in the ntfs.ko filesystem driver in the Linuxkernel 4.15.0 allows attackers to trigger a stack-based out-of-bounds writeand cause a denial of service (kernel oops or panic) or possibly haveunspecified other impact via a crafted ntfs filesystem.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2019-09-06').
linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
